infotexts.entitydescription.cyberarm: An arm made of metal and electronics. Faster and doesn't bleed. Use after amputation to install.
infotexts.entitydescription.cyberleg: A leg made of metal and electronics. Faster and doesn't bleed. Use after amputation to install.
infotexts.entitydescription.waterproofcyberarm: A waterproofed cyberarm made of metal and electronics. Faster and doesn't bleed. Use after amputation to install.
infotexts.entitydescription.waterproofcyberleg: A waterproofed cyberleg made of metal and electronics. Faster and doesn't bleed. Use after amputation to install.
infotexts.entitydescription.augmentedliver: A partially synthetic liver. An improved blood filtration system capable of removing toxins and improving the immune system, ready for reinsertion.
infotexts.entitydescription.augmentedkidney: A partially synthetic kidney. Improves blood production and clotting, altering blood type to C+ for compatibility with other cyber implants. Use after removal of the original kidney to install.
infotexts.entitydescription.augmentedheart: A partially synthetic heart. Improves muscle speed and blood pressure normalization. Use after removal of the original heart to install.
infotexts.entitydescription.augmentedlung: A partially synthetic set of lungs. Improves muscle speed, oxygen capacity, and brief pressure resistance. Use after removal of the original lungs to install.
infotexts.entitydescription.augmentedbrain: A neural augment chip for the brain. Improves skills, and removes the need for analgesia in surgery. Install into the patient's existing brain.
infotexts.entitydescription.cyberliver: A completely synthetic liver. A top of the line blood filtration system capable of removing toxins and improving the immune system, ready for transplant.
infotexts.entitydescription.cyberkidney: A completely synthetic kidney. A top of the line nano-blood production system which improves blood production and clotting, altering blood type to C+ for compatibility with other cyber implants. Use after removal of original kidney to install.
infotexts.entitydescription.cyberheart: A completely synthetic heart. A top of the line circulatory system, improving muscle speed and blood pressure normalization. Use after removal of the original heart to install.
infotexts.entitydescription.cyberlung: A completely synthetic set of lungs. A top of the line respiratory system, improving muscle speed, oxygen capacity, and partial pressure resistance. Use after removal of the original lungs to install.
infotexts.entitydescription.cyberbrain: A positronic cyberbrain implant chipset. Top of the line, supercharges skills and removes the need for analgesia in surgery. Install into the patient's existing brain.
infotexts.entitydescription.abcpluscard: Can take blood from: all of them Can give blood to: C+
infotexts.entitydescription.immunosuppressantinhal: Depresses the immune system to reduce Cyberpsychosis caused by excessive cybernetic implants.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.ntc_cyberarm: The arm is made of metal and electronics
infotexts.afflictiondescription.ntc_cyberleg: The leg is made of metal and electronics
infotexts.afflictiondescription.ntc_waterproof: The limb is not exposed to the deleterious effects of water.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.ntc_cyberlung_pres: The Cyberlung is resisting severe pressure, briefly preventing implosion.
The Cyberlung has resisted severe pressure, and is undertaking self-repair routines.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.ntc_cyberpsychosis: The patient is suffering from Cyberpsychosis, a mental disorder caused by excessive cybernetic implants.
The patient has resistance to Cyberpsychosis.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.ntc_loosescrews: Some screws look dangerously close to falling out. Rattling can be heard when moving the limb.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.ntc_damagedelectro: The limb occasionally emits sparks of electricity. Some subsystems are reporting outages.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.ntc_bentmetal: The limb is bending in an unintended direction.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.ntc_materialloss: Parts of the limb are gone.
